numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice that people of color mainly dominate the field.
2. I wonder how the athletes feel.
3. Some athletes do not have coaches.
4. Some coaches have had the same experiences as the athletes.
5. Some coaches can relate to the athletes.
6. I wonder how the athletes feel when the athletes do not have such coaches.
7. I think that this situation could make us feel less of a person.
8. We see that some non-people of color work in higher-up positions.
9. I live in an area that is mainly people of color.
10. This graph could make us feel that we only belong in certain positions.
11. The headline is: Difference in positions for people of color on the sports field.
